content: 1. An image of an ancient palace, set against a backdrop of lush greenery and mountains, with a young prince Rohan sitting on a throne in the center of the image. Rohan is dressed in traditional attire, with an inquisitive look on his face, and holding an ancient scroll or book in his hand.
